2189219572848131879.Text: I have heard them called that. We do not know what they really are. Perhaps an evil spirit, perhaps a great beast. Whatever they are, they are dangerous. Their claws and tusks rend armor and tear flesh. They will attack alone or in packs. Take care when they are near.

558968932380210466.Text: I've heard tales of them, but I've never seen them. Don't hope to, for that matter.

1480618212103334649.Text: Awful creatures. As if the other things here weren't bad enough....
